ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In this way We show you some of Our greatest Signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That We may go on showing you Our greater signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: for We shall show you some of Our greatest Signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This We have done to show you some of Our greater miracles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “In order that We may show you Our great signs.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That We may show you (some) of Our greater signs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That We may show you of Our greater signs:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We would show thee some of Our greatest signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That We may show thee (some) of Our greater portents,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We shall show you some of Our greatest signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That We may shew thee of Our Signs the greatest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that We may show you some of Our great signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In order that We may show thee (two) of our Greater Signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That We may show you (some) of Our Greater Signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But We shall show you some of Our greatest signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That We may show you some of Our greatest signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:23] That We may show you, thereby, when you do this [as described above] in order to manifest it, of Our greatest signs, the sign that is the greatest proof of [the truth of] your Mission [from God]: and should he want it to be restored to its former state, he would thrust it into his armpit, as has been mentioned, and [then] bring it out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That We may show thee (some) of Our greater portents) Our greater signs,
